alert.note: Alert for Stevens (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Stevens County through 630 PM CDT... At 555 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Trinity Lutheran Country Church, or 15 miles southeast of Wheaton, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chokio and Donnelly around 615 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Morris and Lake Hattie. This includes U.S. Highway 59 between mile markers 168 and 173. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
